Oahpa!-nuõrti is not a full training course, but a set of auxiliary programs for language studying. The programs have many choices and can be adapted to different knowledge levels. We have created a small introduction to each program:

ul.li: Numra – choose a set of numerals, the moments of time or date for exercises
Leksa – Translate words, place names or person names

body.p: Besides Oahpa!-nuõrti vi are also writing a small grammar and a textbook with exercises. The aim with our ressources is to make it possible to train vocabulary and grammar useful for the beginners' level.
Please note that our ressources are a developmental stage and may contain errors. We work on improving them. If you have comments or criticism, feel free to use our feedback form.
